snippet: At least 11 new cruise ships are launching this year, and a similar number is expected next year. What’s driving the growth, and who’s taking these cruises?
abstract: Travelers are showing a renewed interest in river cruises in Europe, with at least 11 new ships launching this year; river cruising is targeted at experienced travelers who want to explore a destination in depth, with a focus on attractions beyond the ship.
lead_paragraph: At least 11 new cruise ships are launching this year, and a similar number is expected next year. What’s driving the growth, and who’s taking these cruises?

headline.seo: Interest in European River Cruises Soars
headline.main: Interest in European River Cruises Soars
